name: Lost Somewhere (MazterZero)
description:
A Short horror game made in 2 days, similar to the backrooms

(Flashlight is in the first tile room, it is on the floor)

Controls:

E - Pick Up/Interact

Esc - Open Menu

Tab - Smart watch/Heart rate monitor

F - Toggle Flashlight

Common Bugs:

- Wont get left alone even if hiding for a long time

Incase you missed:

You need  to watch your heart rate, a normal heart rate is around 81 Beat per second, if it increases you need to hide
